item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving Everyone! This Holiday Season let's Join Together to be Thankful for our Four Legged Best Friends. Sunday November 18th from 1pm-3pm we will have Fun Games & Activities to Keep our Pooches Alert & Active! The pups can try a game of Duck Duck Turkey, Pilgrim Says, or Harvest the Corn.
We are also accepting donations of gently used pet supplies, bag or canned food & treats for local pet shelters.
Hope to see everyone soon!
Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Thanksgiving Celebration!
